name: Heavy Slam
effect:
If the target has used the move Minimize, this move is an automatic Critical Hit. This move adds Damage Dice the heavier the user is than the opponent.
> 10 kg: +1
> 25 kg: +2
> 50 kg: +3
> 100 kg: +4
> 200 kg: +5
description: The user slams the foe using it's whole body weight. Smaller foes will be deeply affected.
